name: Stelflare Syandana
description: Advance into the heat of battle.

languages.description: Rücke in die Hitze des Gefechts vor.
languages.name: Stelflare Syandana

languages.description: Avancez dans le feu de l’action.
languages.name: Syandana Stelflare

languages.description: Avanza hacia el fragor de la batalla.
languages.name: Syandana Stelflare

languages.description: 激戦の熱気へ踏み込もう。
languages.name: Stelflare シャンダナ

languages.description: Avance para o calor da batalha.
languages.name: Syandana: Stelflare

languages.description: 前進到戰鬥的熱浪之中。
languages.name: 星燄披飾

languages.description: ก้าวเข้าสู่การต่อสู้อันดุเดือด
languages.name: ไซอันดานา Stelflare
